mapper.select: SELECT themeCode AS themaCode, themeName AS themaName FROM theme WHERE themeCode != 4 ORDER BY themeCode

SELECT to_char(mpDate,'YYYY') as YEAR , to_char(mpDate,'Q') as QUARTER , to_char(mpDate,'MM') as MONTH ,t.themeCode AS themaCode ,COUNT(*) totalCount FROM magicpass m JOIN facility f ON f.FACILITYCODE = m.FACILITYCODE JOIN theme t ON t.themeCode = f.themeCode WHERE t.themeCode != 4 AND to_char(mpDate,'YYYY')= #{years} GROUP BY to_char(mpDate,'YYYY'), to_char(mpDate,'Q'), to_char(mpDate,'MM'), t.themeCode ORDER BY YEAR, QUARTER, MONTH, themaCode

SELECT to_char(mpDate,'YYYY') as YEAR , to_char(mpDate,'Q') as QUARTER , to_char(mpDate,'MM') as MONTH ,t.themeCode AS themaCode ,f.FACILITYCODE AS ridesCode ,f.name AS ridesName ,COUNT(f.FACILITYCODE) totalCount FROM magicpass m JOIN facility f ON f.FACILITYCODE = m.FACILITYCODE JOIN theme t ON t.themeCode = f.themeCode WHERE t.themeCode != 4 AND f.themeCode=#{themaCode} AND to_char(mpDate,'YYYY')= #{years} GROUP BY to_char(mpDate,'YYYY'), to_char(mpDate,'Q'), to_char(mpDate,'MM'), t.themeCode,f.FACILITYCODE, name ORDER BY YEAR, QUARTER, MONTH, themaCode, ridesCode
